betterquesting:10.desc:8:
To power 1 Large Bronze Boiler you will need 24 coke ovens.

If You build 1 Coke Oven Array with 24 Ovens Vertical or Horizontal and wall shared you will need 489 Coke Oven Bricks.

If you build 4 Coke Oven arrays, 6 Ovens Vertical or Horizontal and wall shared you will need 516 Coke Oven Bricks

If you Build 24 Coke Ovens With no wall sharing you will need 696 Coke Oven Bricks.

Hint: you can save a sizeable amount of coke oven bricks if you wall share these vertically or horizontally.
